short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Prevents Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics and Tag Manager from collecting data and recording the user
short.de: Verhindert, dass die JavaScript-APIs von Google Analytics und Tag Manager Daten sammeln und den Benutzer aufzeichnen
short.es: Evita que las API de JavaScript de Google Analytics y del Administrador de Etiquetas recojan datos y registren al usuario
short.fr: Empêche les API JavaScript de Google Analytics et de Tag Manager de collecter des données et d'enregistrer l'utilisateur
short.it: Impedisce alle API JavaScript di Google Analytics e Tag Manager di raccogliere dati e registrare l'utente
short.ja: Google AnalyticsとTag ManagerのJavaScript APIがデータを収集してユーザーを記録するのを防ぐ
short.nl: Voorkomt dat de JavaScript-API's van Google Analytics en Tag Manager gegevens verzamelen en de gebruiker registreren.
short.pl: Zapobiega zbieraniu danych i nagrywaniu użytkownika przez API JavaScript Google Analytics i Tag Manager.
short.pt_BR: Impede que as APIs JavaScript do Google Analytics e Tag Manager coletem dados e gravem o usuário
short.pt_PT: Impede que as APIs JavaScript do Google Analytics e do Tag Manager recolham dados e registem o utilizador
short.ru: Предотвращает JavaScript API Google Analytics и Tag Manager от сбора данных и записи пользователя.
short.zh_CN: 防止Google Analytics和Tag Manager的JavaScript API收集数据和记录用户。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension inserts a minimal object into every webpage you visit, asking the Analytics API to refrain from tracking your activities. Unlike adblocker scripts that block web requests associated with Analytics, this extension requests not to be recorded by "ga.js," "analytics.js," and "dc.js" scripts. It effectively safeguards your privacy by preventing popular analytic scripts like Google Analytics and Tag Manager from collecting your data.

When a request is denied, the action button becomes colorful, catching your attention. Hover over the button to view the total count of rejected requests.

Supported Analytics:
1. Google Analytics
2. Adobe Analytics
3. Tag Manager
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
This extension adds an object to all web pages that user is browsing and requests from Analytics API to not track the user. Unlike adblocker script that block web requests, this extension peacefully requests to not being recorded, that's it!

When a request is being rejected, the page action button becomes colorful. Place the mouse over the button to see the total number of rejected requests.
